channel.title: R on Brannon Tatum
channel.description: Recent content in R on Brannon Tatum

item.title: R Studio and Python
item.description: Python and R are two languages used for coding. In this blog post, I am going to demonstrate coding with R and coding with python. I will then use reticulate to demonstrate how R code and python code communicate and can be used together. Finally, I will add an image of the Survivor logo to demonstrate inserting visuals in an R Markdown file. This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents.
